name: IGI TOP Sniper City Shooter
description:
Take place on the roof of this enormous city and sniper them all with your rifle. This Sniper City bravo Challenge is a 3D action simulator fully packed with action and shooting simulations. The realistic city is taking over by crime and violence and it needs to be cleaned up! So we have to take down all the enemies and save the citizenry from target killer and other enemy that are trying to take over the streets.But its modern time and modern city they are in fury because they are in clouds of crimes which sound bad. And they have decided to take revenge or to clean out the entire city from these criminals and killers.Now its US Sniper duty to keep his mission continues until he succeeds.
Each level has different mission. Aim your target carefully. You can also slow down your moving enemies by using slow-motion feature. Drag the zoom slider up to zoom in and down to zoom out. Controls will help you to target accurately.Be the real sniper survival hero of modern assassin force and get ready for thrilling sniping missions and prove yourself as the real city sniper hero of survival city in an amazing FPS game of 2017.
Shooting games have never been so fun until now, come and join in the action and be the ultimate sniper hunter in Sniper City.
Features:
- Realistic 3D graphics.
- Easy gaming controls.
- Fully packed with action
- Use zoom button if you cannot see clearly due to distance.
- Use fire button to kill or shoot.
- Realistic Sound Effects.
- Experience Amazing Sniping Missions.
- Thrilling Action Packed FPS Game.
